summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing development of necessary additional geotechnical data, design concepts and preliminary construction cost estimates for the Vashon Place S.W., et al Slide Investigation; authorizing the hiring of consultants; authorizing execution of funding agreements and acceptance of financial assistance that may become available; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1983 Budget of the Engineering Department; making an appropriation from the Engineering Operating Fund and a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund; and declaring the emergency therefor.
